Name: Gang District
About the game: Gang District is a local multiplayer shooter party game with a share screen mechanism. Pick up a weapon and start blasting and kick some tail! Gang District supports the Steam Remote Play feature. But it is built to play locally. It has 28+ weapons and 12 maps at this stage. Weapons are randomly spawning at specific locations with a percentage chance for each weapon to spawn. While maps are selectable at any time of the game. There are currently 6 mini boss weapons. If you are lucky enough, you might have them and win the game. Gang District is developed by a sole developer.
Meta Title: Gang District: Dec 5, 2019, MasterdniM and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gang District? Check out the release date (Dec 5, 2019), developer insights from MasterdniM, and a complete game summary.
